title: The CW Reboots Dark Shadows Into Dark Shadows: Reincarnation
text:
Jonathan Frid as the vampire Barnabas Collins in Dark Shadows Photo: Walt Disney Television via Getty Images Photo Archives

Luckily for The CW, they don’t even have to infuse a Dark Shadows reboot with a hip new dark, sexy, camp energy. That was the whole appeal of the show to begin with! According to Deadline, the network that brought you brooding, horny Riverdale and an upcoming Nancy Drew series that demonstrated considerable levels of horniness in a pilot preview, is now developing a “gothic horror drama” reboot of the ‘60s soap opera. Dark Shadows: Reincarnation will be penned by Revenge writer Mark B. Perry, and honestly that show was pretty horny, too.

For those who haven’t seen the occult cult hit, this show had everything: the extremely cursed, rich Collins family; a new governess getting too close to a hidden secret, vampires, murder, and Maine. (All of these elements will reportedly be resurrected in the update!) For those who don’t know Dark Shadows, maybe don’t give it a Goog. There’s a 2012 movie version that will drive you to the brink of madness, and that’s just Johnny Depp’s wig.
description: The CW developing cult 1960s soap opera Dark Shadows into Dark Shadows: Reincarnation reboot, in the vein of Riverdale.
